column1: #Text=Polycrystalline samples of the RENiSb ternaries were synthesized from elemental constituents (purities: RE min. 99.9 at%, Ni 99.999 at%, Sb 99.99 at%) by arc-melting technique.
#Text=Specimens were remelted several times and evaporation of antimony was compensated by adding extra amount of this element before syntheses.

#Text=In case of DyNiSb, subsequent heat treatment (1123 K, 14 days) under vacuum was found necessary for obtaining homogeneous samples due to presence of unidentified secondary phases (up to 30 vol%) in as-cast specimen.
